user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable, well-fitting socks that accommodate my wide feet and support my active lifestyle.
purchase_reason: I needed a comfortable option for daily wear that accommodates my wide feet. The product's description highlighted its suitability for individuals with wider feet, which was a key factor in my decision. The positive rating and the review indicating daily use reinforced my choice, as I was looking for something reliable and comfortable.

I was specifically looking for socks that wouldn't constrict my feet, and the product's description emphasized its extra-wide fit. The review confirmed that these were the first socks that fit my feet properly, which was a significant factor in my decision. The combination of comfort and fit was crucial for my active lifestyle.

I sought a premium quality sock that would keep my feet dry and comfortable during use. The product's features, such as AquaFX technology and cushioning, appealed to my need for comfort. However, the review indicated a fit issue, which made me reconsider my choice, but I still valued the quality aspects.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, quality, and a good fit. I value items made from soft, breathable materials, such as premium cotton, that provide all-day comfort. I appreciate clothing that is well-constructed, durable, and maintains its shape after washing. Additionally, I enjoy vibrant colors and interesting designs, especially in accessories like socks, as they add a fun element to my wardrobe. Consistent sizing and the ability to find the right fit without extra costs are also important to me. On the other hand, I tend to dislike products that are poorly fitting, uncomfortable, or made from low-quality materials. I am not fond of items that do not meet my expectations in terms of comfort or that feel restrictive, such as socks that are too tight.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable, well-fitting socks for my wide feet that can support my active lifestyle. within my expected price range: [25.99, 29.99]
What specific activities do you engage in as part of your active lifestyle to ensure the socks meet your requirements?

I enjoy a variety of activities like running, hiking, and working out at the gym as part of my active lifestyle. Comfort and support are crucial for me, especially in socks that can keep up with these activities.
What length of socks do you prefer for your various activities like running, hiking, and working out at the gym?

I usually prefer crew-length socks for my various activities like running, hiking, and working out at the gym. They provide a good balance between coverage and breathability, which is essential for keeping my feet comfortable during these activities.
What materials do you prefer in your socks to ensure they meet your comfort and support needs during activities like running, hiking, and working out at the gym?

I generally prefer socks made from soft, breathable materials like premium cotton for my activities like running, hiking, and working out at the gym. These materials offer all-day comfort and help keep my feet dry and comfortable during various exercises. Quality and durability are important to me, so I look for socks that maintain their shape after washing and provide the right amount of support for my active lifestyle.

Item No.2 : Item Title: <Rich Cotton Men's Multi-Pack Cushioned Performance No-Show Socks - Breathable Compression Athletic Socks> / Item ID: B0C62LVKHW / Price: $12.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Active', 'Athletic Socks'] / Description: ["Step into ultimate comfort with Rich Cotton's Men's No-Show Athletic Socks. Imagine slipping your feet into a breathable compression sock that supports your every move, whether you're running, walking, or working out. These men's low cut socks, designed for mens sizes 10-13, go beyond the average sports socks. Equipped with advanced moisture-absorbing technology, they ensure your feet stay dry, promoting a comfortable environment for your feet even during intense physical activities. Plus, with their reinforced toe and heel, every step you take is well-cushioned. But what sets these socks apart is the true arch support, providing not just comfort but also essential support that ordinary socks often overlook. Imagine the enhanced performance you can achieve when your feet feel their best, all thanks to our no-show socks. And, they come in 3 color option black, white, and multi-color. Crafted from a premium blend of 87% cotton and 13% polyester. Don't just settle for less when it comes to your feet's comfort and performance. Upgrade your sock game today with Rich Cotton's No-Show Athletic Socks. You will not only run, jump, and work hard but also feel the difference in every step you take. Start experiencing the ultimate blend of style, comfort, and support today. Composition: 87% Cotton, 13% Polyester."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Rich Cotton Men's Multi-Pack Cotton Cushioned Athletic Ankle Socks - Performance Quarter Socks> / Item ID: B0C62DZ4XW / Price: $12.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Sport Specific Clothing', 'Running'] / Description: ["Embrace comfort and performance with the Rich Cotton Men's 6-Pack Performance Athletic Ankle Socks. If you're an active man seeking to add a touch of functionality to your wardrobe, our socks are the ideal choice for you! Our socks are crafted from high-quality cotton, ensuring your feet enjoy superior breathability and insulation. They offer moisture-wicking properties that guarantee dryness and comfort throughout the day, no matter how demanding your activities. With an added layer of cushioning, they promise significant impact protection for your various physical activities. Featuring a compression design, they provide 360-degree support to your feet and calves. They come in multiple colors - classic white, black, and multi-color. Crafted from a premium blend of 87% cotton and 13% polyester. With their reinforced heel and toe areas, these socks are built to withstand not just your toughest workouts but also the test of time. Don't just wear any socks; elevate your daily routine and athletic pursuits with the Rich Cotton Men's Performance Athletic Ankle Socks. Your feet will relish the comfort and your performance will show the difference. Step into a new world of comfort and durability. Experience the Rich Cotton difference today, because every step counts. Composition: 87% Cotton, 13% Polyester."]
